events.name: PHP The Right Way: The Workshop - Day 2
events.description:
Venue:
IDA Labs@NDC
National Design Centre
111 Middle Road
#02-04, Singapore 188969

Date: Saturday, 13 Aug 2016
Time: 9am - 5pm

Fees: Free of charge**

About The Workshop
===============
PHP The Right Way Workshop aims to bring awareness to existing PHP developers about the best practices and coding standards of PHP programming.

More information about PHP The Right Way (documentation) itself may be found here: http://www.phptherightway.com/

This workshop aims to highlight most (if not all) the topics covered in the documentation itself in this 2-Day workshop.

Topics Covered in Day 1 (6 August):
==========================
Dependency Injection - Michael Bui
Security - Prasanna Kanagasabai
Coding Practices - Tracy Lemke

Topics Covered in Day 2 (13 August):
==========================
Testing - Hanif Norman
Virtualization - Michael Bui
Debugging - Michael Bui
Caching - Michael Cheng

Note: Light lunch will be provided.

** We are offering this workshop for free as this is our first run. We will however, pass around a donation box if you feel like helping us defray the cost of refreshments.

*** Please install a copy of Docker to work with the sample codes (https://www.docker.com/products/docker)

====================================
Venue Sponsor: IDA Labs @ NDC
Food Sponsor: Code Craft Pte Ltd
events.location: National Design Centre, 111 Middle Road, Singapore 188969

events.name: PluralSight study group
events.description:
Hello Guys and Girls, 


I want to invite all of you for our next Meet up. We will use recorded courses this time again. Below list of course you can choose from. We will take one with most of votes. 1. Testing PowerShell with Pester by Robert Cain - 4h 11m Testing should be integral to all IT activities. This course will show you how to create tests for your PowerShell scripts and modules using Pester, the new open source testing tool. 2. PowerShell for Office 365 by Vlad Catrinescu 3h 36m Take your Office 365 Administrator skills further by learning to automate repetitive tasks as well as access advanced settings using the magic of PowerShell. 


3. Building Advanced PowerShell Functions and Modules by Adam Bertram - time 4h If you're looking to go from someone who simply hacks things together with PowerShell to someone with the skills to build readable and maintainable code, then this is the course for you. We will cover everything there is to know. Hope to see you there.
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22, Meeting Room

events.name: Experience the Excitement Ahead Of The 2016 Formula One (TM) Singapore Airlines Singapore Grand Prix with Robinsons!
events.description:
This August, gear up for the 2016 Formula OneTM Singapore Airlines Singapore Grand Prix with Robinsons! As the first department store in Singapore to run a pre-event campaign for the world’s most renowned racing event, Robinsons is presenting the ultimate F1 Singapore Grand Prix experience to its shoppers with a line-up of engaging activities, promotions and grand giveaways that will take place from now to 28 August 2016.
During this promotional period, shoppers who spend $150 nett at Robinsons The Heeren, Raffles City and JEM will stand a chance to win “Money Can’t Buy” experiences and race tickets to the 2016 Formula OneTM Singapore Airlines Singapore Grand Prix, with the grand prize comprising a highly-coveted pair of 3-day Pit Grandstand tickets worth $2,576 and a pair of Formula OneTM Drivers' autograph session passes.
Shoppers can look forward to experiencing the ultimate way of being a F1 racer at no cost through a special RevUp! F1 Roving Truck, which will be making its pit stop across Robinsons Raffles City and JEM stores on 13 August and 14 August respectively.
On 21 August, enjoy the company of a bevy of F1 Grid Girls and get snap-happy at the Pop-Up Photo Booth, which will both be at Robinsons The Heeren to rally support and create buzz around the upcoming racing event. Additionally, get up close and personal with a life-sized replica of a F1 race car inside Robinsons The Heeren from 21 August to 25 August, where shoppers are able to take photos with the race car and share with their loved ones!
For more information on the series of activities and promotions taking place at Robinsons for the 2016 Formula OneTM Singapore Airlines Singapore Grand Prix, visit www.robinsons.com.sg.
events.location: Robinsons The Heeren, 260 Orchard Road, Singapore 238855
